about_the_game:
Saving Astral is a roguelike space shooter. Players will have to play their best to get as far as possible and defeat the city's Titan.
Fight on a mysterious planet with randomly spawning enemies. With over 20 items at your disposal, you will find the tools you need to save the City and eventually your Mother.

The higher the in-game time gets, the harder the difficulty gets. Keeping a sense of urgency keeps the game exciting!
Regardless of whether you win or lose the playthroughs will be exciting and enjoyable.

short_description: Somewhere among the stars awaits a remedy for your Mother. Search a vast mysterious Planet on the verge of collapse while fighting to survive. What perils await you? What will become of the Planet? What legacy will you carve into the skies? What fate awaits your Mother.
